parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True appends the detail circle to the selection list, false replaces the selection list with this detail circle

parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True appends the detail circle to the selection list, false replaces the selection list with this detail circle

returns: True if the detail circle is selected, false if not
